page.title: 11LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: WHEN I COME HOME FROM SCHOOL,I CHANGE INTO MY OLD CLOTHES AND GO AND PLAY IN THE GARDEN FOR ABOUT HALF AN HOUR.I USUALLY PLAY ON MY BIKE OR PLAY ON THE SWING,AND THEN GO AND GET SOME THING TO EAT.THEN WE MIGHT DECIDE TO GO FOR A RIDE ON OUR BIKES WITH MY MUM AND DAD.WE SERVICE OUR BIKES BEFORE GOING OUT,OUR FAVOURITE PLACE ISA TRAIN BRIDGE IT'S NOT VERY WIDE NO WIDER THAN THE LENGTH OF ME.IT'S QUITE NEAR A TUNNEL SO WE WATCH THE TRAINS COMING OUT AND GET THEM TO BLOW THEIR HORNS,THEY USUALLY DO.WE STAY THERE FOR ABOUT HALF AN HOUR TO AN HOUR. THEN WE GO BACK HOME AND HAVE A REST AND THEN WE MIGHT GO OUT IN THE CAR AND FIND A FOOTPATH OR A WOOD AND GO FOR A WALK OR JUST RIDE AROUND IN THE CAR.AFTER THAT WE'D COME HOME AND HAVE TEA.
